org.tiralab.particles

Class Particle

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.tiralab.particles.Particle

  • public class Particle
extends java.lang.Object
    Store information about single particle. TODO: The particle class should provide clean way to get previous values.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Particle(float x, float y)
      This constructor allows you to set initial position of the particle.
